ABOUT BSMG

BSMG has Helped Hundreds Get Their Foot in the Door of the Broadcast Industry in New Jersey

You cannot become a successful broadcaster by simply taking classes or reading a textbook. It requires hands-on experience and spending time to hone your talent.

It’s also essential to have key contacts within the industry.

BSMG is the missing link to successfully starting a career in radio broadcasting. Aspiring broadcasters like you are able to get real-world experience and key contacts within a local station in New Jersey of your own choosing.

After 13 years and hundreds of mentorships facilitated, we have a passion to prepare and equip the next generation of broadcasters for success in an industry that is getting more difficult to enter each year.

Learn Why Mentoring is Essential for Entering the Broadcast Industry

We are Connected to Nearly Every Radio Media Company in the U.S.

Our Network Contains over 750 Mentors

Hands-on Training that You Cannot Get from a Textbook.

Hands-on Training that You Cannot Get from a Textbook.

70 – 90% Lower Cost.

The average college degree in broadcasting is $28,000 – $96,000 and rarely does that include any experience at a real local radio station.

Lectures, textbooks, and class projects will not be enough to get your foot in the door in the radio broadcasting industry.

What you need is experience and key contacts in the industry. This is exactly what a BSMG mentorship is designed to provide you.

And at a fraction of the cost.

Position yourself for success in the broadcasting industry with an 87% faster program that is up to 90% less expensive.
